hero.title: Share Code Snippets with Ease
hero.description: Create, share, and store your code snippets in seconds. Perfect syntax highlighting, with powerful features to make sharing your code effortless.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to share your code snippets efficiently and securely. We've built the perfect tool for developers, by developers.

syntaxHighlighting.title: Syntax Highlighting
syntaxHighlighting.description: Beautiful code formatting with support for over 100 programming languages.

easySharing.title: Easy Sharing
easySharing.description: Generate and share links instantly with anyone, anywhere.

flexibleExpiration.title: Flexible Expiration
flexibleExpiration.description: Set your paste to expire after a specific time, from 1 day to 1 year.

passwordProtection.title: Password Protection
passwordProtection.description: Keep your sensitive code secure with optional password protection.

multipleThemes.title: Multiple Themes
multipleThemes.description: Choose from a variety of themes to make your code look just right.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Our optimized platform ensures your pastes load instantly, every time.

myWebsite.title: My Website
myWebsite.heading: Welcome to My Website
myWebsite.content: This is a sample HTML page.
